title: Add positioning recommendation versioning and channel pinning to reduce messaging drift

sections.text: Implement lightweight versioning for positioning recommendations (segment + effective date + author/approver) and allow each messaging channel asset to be pinned to an approved recommendation version. Store the pinned version ID on each asset and expose it in the internal API so the existing messaging consistency audit can compare against the correct baseline. This prevents teams from unknowingly referencing outdated recommendations when updating copy across channels.
